Detailed Description

template<class Scope1, class Scope2>
class ZThread::CompoundScope< Scope1, Scope2 >

Author:
Eric Crahen <crahen@cse.buffalo.edu>
Date:
<2002-05-30T16:03:16-0400>
Version:
2.2.0
Locking policy that aggregates two policies that share a target. It is not appopriate to use with any type of OverlappedScope
